  • Stay calm… or don’t! Influence the masses with the new “Panic” mechanic . The panic meter measures how the Tropican citizens feel about the diseases. High panic allows for more powerful edicts to be enacted. Should you raise the alarm in order to exploit the situation with powerful edicts, or keep the population calm in the face of a potentially deadly threat?
  • Inject first, ask later: A host of 16 exciting new edicts will be unlocked as your panic meter rises and will give you different ways in which to exploit the disease in Tropico: Inject first , ask questions later, mandate masks , or choose to gear up for a viral palace party , it’s all up to you, El Presidente!
  • Managing the disease: 9 new buildings will change the way you manage Tropico and how you deal with outbreaks and diseases. Use the Healing Howitzer to speedily distribute the cure to your Tropicans or build the new Colossal Hospital to increase your medical capacities and place Medical Checkpoints on the streets to find infected people.
    In addition, during the campaign a curious quack will also help you manage the disease in Ambrosius’ Magic Hut .
  • Fight the plague in style with new design options for El Presidente & the palace! With new accessories like the plague doctor for El Presidente or the Medical Fencing for your palace, you'll be perfectly prepared.

tropico6_festival.callout:
Take on 'Boredom' - an ancient evil threatening to engulf Tropico in clouds of mundanity and mind-numbing activities

53% Positive on Steam
tropico6_festival.description_text:
Get on your dancing shoes, ‘Festival’ DLC brings the party to Tropico 6! Help El Presidente host a killer party and stave off an ancient entity while he’s at it.

Plan, build and use your stunning sense of cunning to take on ‘Boredom’: an evil entity threatening to remove all entertainment from the sun-soaked paradise of Tropico.

Choose from four festival areas and +20 variations of party, each bringing their own unique swing to the isles. Knowledge is power and what’s power without cash? Swap in your know-how for financial gain or enjoy an increased birth rate after the party goers have had their fun. Repel the ancient ‘Boredom’ with measures seldom seen by El Prez’ like singing, dancing, and general good cheer. Become the hottest party planner on the archipelago with new buildings like the Dance School or Balloon and Fireworks factory and ensure all eyes are on you with a snazzy new party outfit and theme for the presidential palace. Deal the death blow to ‘Boredom’ with a jukebox full of catchy tunes and party like your life depends on it, because it does!

Party it up with the new ‘Festival’ mechanic: host 20+ variations of festival in 4 special areas, each with their own unique effects such as converting knowledge points into money and an increased baby boom once the party goers have had their fun

New scenario-driven campaign: play across 5 maps to take on ‘Boredom’ – an ancient evil threatening to engulf Tropico in clouds of mundanity and mind-numbing activities

8 new buildings: make use of 4 new festival areas and ensure your parties are well equipped with new buildings like the Balloon Factory and Fireworks Factory. Add a spring to your citizens’ step with the Dance School and keep your island visitor numbers healthy by adding a Ticket Booth for specific festivals

4 new tunes: keep the party going with an assortment of new tracks, each tailored to a different festival

3 new edicts: experiment with exciting new features like Funhouser Special, Customer Service and Laundry Festivals

2 new customization options: pick your perfect party outfit and set your palace to match

tropico6_dlcspitter.callout:
Interact with superstars & faction leaders via Spitter Social Media feature

53% Positive on Steam
tropico6_dlcspitter.description_text:
It’s all about the fame and prestige. Nobody knows this better than a self-declared despot...uh, statesman, such as El Presidente. Tropico 6’s second DLC skyrockets you into the world of stardom and illustriousness. Interact with superstars by using Spitter , the only short message social networking app officially approved by the Tropican Ministry for Modern Communications & Smoke Signals. Court the stars to gain their support, unlock their individual strengths and in turn receive even more respect and adulation from your subjects. But beware - fame and money can also attract some seriously shady types…

At the heart of the DLC is the new Spitter mechanic, which allows you to interact with celebrities and faction leaders to increase your standing. Use new buildings like the Rehab Center or Beauty Farm to attract celebrities and make them permanent citizens of Tropico. Plus, enjoy even more new content with three new music tracks, additional customization items and a new trait for El Prez.

New Spitter Social Media feature : Interact with superstars and faction leaders via a social app, to increase your standing and unlock new special traits of the celebrities

New mission and sandbox map

3 new buildings : Lure celebrities to Tropico by building a Rehab Center or Beauty Farm and make them permanent residents using the Super Villa

New trait : Narcissist

3 new tracks : Comercio Feliz, La Celebridad, Fiesta en el Club

5 new customization options for El Prez and his palace

oceana.description_text:
Donations to support Oceana are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Oceana is the largest international advocacy organization dedicated solely to ocean conservation. Oceana is rebuilding abundant and biodiverse oceans by winning science-based policies in countries that control one-third of the world’s wild fish catch. With more than 225 victories that stop overfishing, habitat destruction, pollution, and the killing of threatened species like turtles and sharks, Oceana’s campaigns are delivering results. A restored ocean means that 1 billion people can enjoy a healthy seafood meal, every day, forever. Together, we can save the oceans and help feed the world. Visit www.oceana.org to learn more.

tropico3_gold.callout:
Complete Edition

90% Positive on Steam
tropico3_gold.description_text:
Engage in a tropical power trip! Become the dictator of a remote island during the Cold War. Charm, persuade, intimidate, oppress, or cheat your people to stay in power! Are you a kind and generous leader? A corrupt and ruthless tyrant ruling with an iron fist? Turn your island into a tourist paradise or an industrial power. Make promises to the electorate or slander political adversaries to get the crucial votes for the upcoming elections. Send your avatar to congratulate the people, visit the island of another player, or just sun-bathe on the Caribbean beach.

Play the Cold War superpowers against each other to your maximum advantage. Tropico 3 offers a tongue-in-cheek, light-hearted take on real world issues like third world politics, corruption and totalitarian regimes.

  • A campaign consisting of 15 missions
  • Random map generator
  • Timeline editor
  • The Avatar — customizable and under the player's control
  • Election speeches
  • Simulation of the life, family, and political views of each Tropican
  • Vehicles and Roads
  • New buildings and new units

railwayempire_mexico.callout:
New scenario, Map expansion, 2 engines, and more!

79% Positive on Steam
railwayempire_mexico.description_text:
Discover the diversity of Mexico - take on new and challenging missions in the arid northern regions all the way to the dense jungles in the south of the country. Boost Mexico’s economy in the new scenario by building a thriving infrastructure and exporting to the USA.
  • New scenario: “Viva Mexico!” (1873-1893)
  • Map expansion: Mexico (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
  • New goods (e.g. coffee and sugar) and more than 24 new cities
  • New engines: Fairlie (0-6-6-0) and Stirling (4-2-2) 
  • Explore the world of Railway Empire in a new exclusive night mode

tropico6_elprezedition.callout:
Includes Soundtrack & El Prez Edition Upgrade

84% Positive on Steam
tropico6_elprezedition.description_text:
El Prez Edition

The exclusive palace design contains the captivating flamingo pond, something every dictator craves to impress his neighbouring states and a tourist costume for El Prez to enjoy those warm caribbean nights adequately. You can also treat your ears to the digital soundtrack, featuring the game's unique and catchy musical score as well as a digital calendar for your dictatorial plans throughout the year.

El Presidente is back!

 Play on large archipelagos for the first time in the series. Manage multiple islands at the same time and adapt to various new challenges.

 Send your agents on raids to foreign lands to steal world wonders and monuments, to add them to your collection.

 Build bridges, construct tunnels and transport your citizens and tourists in taxis, buses and aerial cable cars. Tropico 6 offers completely new transportation and infrastructure possibilities.

 Customize the looks of your palace at will and choose from various extras.

 Tropico 6 features a revised research system focusing on the political aspects of being the world’s greatest dictator.

 Election speeches are back! Address the people and make promises that you can’t possibly keep.

In times of political turmoil and social unrest, the people are calling for visionary leaders, who will steer the fate of their country with foresight and ingenuity. Prove yourself once again as a feared dictator or peace-loving statesman on the island state of Tropico and shape the fate of your very own banana republic through four distinctive eras. Face new challenges on the international stage and always keep the needs of your people in mind.

For the first time in the series, manage extensive archipelagos, build bridges to connect your islands and use new means of transportation and infrastructure. Send your Tropicans on raids to steal the wonders of the world, including the Statue of Liberty and the Eiffel Tower. Customize your palace at will and give election speeches from your balcony, to win the favor of your subjects.

railwayempire_greatbritainandireland.callout:
New scenario, Map expansion, 10 engines, and more!

80% Positive on Steam
railwayempire_greatbritainandireland.description_text:
Feature List
  • New scenario – Transport Revolution (1830 - 1850)
  • Map expansion: Great Britain & Ireland (available in Free Game and Sandbox Modes)
  • 10 historical engines like the Rocket (0-2-2) or Firefly (0-2-0)
  • 13 new tradeable goods (e.g. cider and whisky) and 45 new cities
  • New songs and reworked city buildings
Summary

England - Home of the first steam engines is experiencing an age of unprecedented progress and technological innovations. Expand your rail network across the British Isles as streets and canals cannot cope with the burgeoning requirements of industrial city centers. Build respect and social standing among those who have their doubts in locomotives as the future of transportation. Prevail against competing railway companies to gain prosperity and fame.

portroyale3_goldedition.callout:
Complete Edition

72% Positive on Steam
portroyale3_goldedition.description_text:
Port Royale 3 – Gold Edition contains the full version of the multiple award-winning strategy game, Port Royale 3, as well as the official expansion pack, Treasure Island. Players will embark on an epic adventure through the Caribbean during the turbulent 17th Century where the naval powers of Spain, England, France and the Netherlands fight for supremacy in the colonies. Take on the role of a young captain trying to build his fortune and reputation in the new world colonies where three expansive campaigns offer three different paths for the young protagonist to follow: adventurer, trader and pirate.

For those eager to stretch their skills further there is the scenario mode where players will find several demanding challenges in the fields of trade, adventure and piracy. Additionally, following the successful completion of a scenario, each player will receive a score based on their performance, which can be compared to other Port Royale 3 players in the online rankings.

Features:

  • Three unique single-player campaigns: the trader’s campaign, the adventurer’s campaign and the pirate’s campaign
  • Exciting naval battles, plundering and invasions await adventurous players, while immeasurable wealth and power are waiting for trade-oriented players
  • 16 different ship types, such as the powerful Galleon or versatile Frigates
  • Huge gameplay map with 60 completely different towns, from Port-au-Prince to Tortuga
  • Competitive multiplayer mode for up to four players (PC version only)
  • A comprehensive trade system, with supply and demand dynamically setting the price of goods and wares, like in the real world

railwayempire_northerneurope.callout:
New scenario, new map, 3 engines & more

59% Positive on Steam
railwayempire_northerneurope.description_text:
Railway Empire heads to ‘Northern Europe’ with its latest DLC. Aid the Swedish Parliament and construct a national railroad to continue the country’s far-reaching industrial advancements along the lakes and sprawling rivers that were first used by freight ships to provide goods and supplies to Northern Europe’s people.

  • New scenario: Hibernation (1853-1870)
  • Map expansion: ‘Northern Europe’ (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
  • 3 historical engines: Odin (2-2-2), Prins August (2-4-0) and SJB II (4-6-0)
  • 10 new tradeable goods (e.g. crisp bread and brown cheese) and 30 new cities
  • ‘Concession’ feature: The map is divided into sections. Buy concessions to gain access to new building grounds (Also available on the full North American map)
  • Snow: Enhanced weather system for all northern regions in the game
  • New regional soundtrack

railwayempire_downunder.callout:
New scenario, new map, 3 engines & more

70% Positive on Steam
railwayempire_downunder.description_text:
During the first half of the 19th Century, the colonial territories of Australia are sparsely populated and consist primarily of coastal cities and a few smaller farming settlements in the remote outback. However, a series of events is set to spark an industrial revolution, one that will usher in an era of change for Australia and secure a lucrative future. In the Railway Empire “Down Under” DLC, it is up to you to tame the unforgiving outback and expand your railway network across its wild terrain and beyond. Your railway will ultimately be the key to laying the foundations for flourishing cities and to connecting remote mining settlements to coastal metropolises. Are you ready to face the sun-scorched landscape of Australia’s Red Centre?

Features:
  • New scenario: “Pioneering spirit” (1830-1930)
  • Map expansion: “Down Under” (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
  • 3 new historical engines: Heisler (0-8-0), C30 (4-6-0) and Class S (4-6-2)
  • New tradeable goods (eg. seafood, Rail-O-Mite and canned beer) and 52 new cities to discover
  • New music tracks, reworked city buildings and unique mission structures (eg. Sydney Harbour Bridge)
  • New Settlement feature unique to the “Down Under” map: on pre-determined locations, players can now establish new cities and this way arrange the economic system to their liking

railwayempire_france.callout:
New scenario, new map, 10 engines & more

86% Positive on Steam
railwayempire_france.description_text:
In the wake of Emperor Napoleon III’s exile, the French monarchy has collapsed for the second time, and the Third Republic has taken its place. In the Railway Empire – France DLC you will decide your country’s industrial future. Either take sides with a militaristic general and increase the strength of France’s borders in anticipation of a new war or help the minister of public work to rebuild the infrastructure of the country and undertake the controversial new “Eiffel Tower” project.

Features:
  • New scenario – Into a new time (1874-1890)
  • Map expansion: France (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
  • 10 historical engines such as the Coupe Vent (4-4-0) and Forquenot (2-4-2)
  • More than 12 new tradeable goods (e.g. wine and soft cheese) and 31 new cities
  • ‘Concession’ feature: The map is divided into sections. Buy concessions to gain access to new building grounds (also available on the full North American map)
  • New songs and updated characters

tropico6_thellamaofwallstreet.human_name: Tropico 6 - The Llama of Wall Street
tropico6_thellamaofwallstreet.callout:
Enter the world of BIG BUSINESS

59% Positive on Steam
tropico6_thellamaofwallstreet.description_text:
It’s time to play in the major leagues! El Presidente is descending on the world of international brands, big time. Power in politics is never enough for a man with ambitions as great as El Prez, so join forces with the shady…uh, completely trustworthy broker, and help Tropico to establish its status as a global megabrand . Unravel the secrets behind the broker’s sinister master plan, as you try to sabotage the US finance market. In order to assert yourself, you will have to be a llama among wolves . Well, something like that...

New gameplay mechanics await, as the prices of goods will now succumb to fluctuations and trends in the global market. Use new buildings like the Trade Institute to play the markets and manipulate export prices . Random events will pose an additional challenge, and you’ll also find lots of new content to dive into, like new traits, customization options and edicts.

New standalone mission : “The Llama of Wall Street” – enter the world of big business

New buildings: Trade Institute , Toy Workshop and Smart Furniture Studio will help to enhance your economic power

New gameplay mechanics : Goods are now subject to price fluctuations , trade impacts and trends – affect global markets by using the Trade Institute to forecast future trends and play the markets

New challenges : random events will occur and will have positive, negative or mixed effects on global market situations, trade or production

New sandbox map : Acantilado Humeante

New edict , traits and customization options for El Prez and your palace

oceana.description_text:
Donations to support Oceana are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Oceana is the largest international advocacy organization dedicated solely to ocean conservation. Oceana is rebuilding abundant and biodiverse oceans by winning science-based policies in countries that control one-third of the world’s wild fish catch. With more than 225 victories that stop overfishing, habitat destruction, pollution, and the killing of threatened species like turtles and sharks, Oceana’s campaigns are delivering results. A restored ocean means that 1 billion people can enjoy a healthy seafood meal, every day, forever. Together, we can save the oceans and help feed the world. Visit www.oceana.org to learn more.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Empires and Engines: Return to Tropico & More from Kalypso!
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: The tracks are laid for great games
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Tropico 6, Railway Empire, Tropico 3: Gold Edition, Tropico 6 - Going Viral, Tropico 6 - New Frontiers, Spacebase Startopia Extended, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Introducing the Empires and Engines: Return to Tropico & More Bundle from Kalypso Media! Step into Tropico 6, the city builder that blends political intrigue and humor into a bold new take on the island sim. Will you rule with compassion or an iron fist? The choices—and their consequences—are yours to make! Or climb aboard Railway Empire, the ultimate train sim featuring more than 40 meticulously detailed locomotives. Build and manage stations, maintain factories, expand your network, and much more! Pay what you want for a massive library of games, add-ons, and DLC—and help support Oceana with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Kalypso Media USA Inc.

basic_data.human_name: AudioHero's Largest Cinematic Creator Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Add professional-quality polish to your streams, YouTube videos, podcasts, and more with a gigantic bundle of licensed tracks and worldwide rights. One download gives you royalty-free music ranging from Arcade Anthems to Blockbuster Beasts. In this Humble exclusive, you’ll also unlock the Action Hero, Prodigy, and Starter Plans! Get a massive library of over 300,000 royalty-free songs and sounds from AudioHero Inc.—complete with licenses included—all for a price you choose! Plus, a portion of your purchase helps support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Royalty free music sure sounds nice
basic_data.description:
Royalty free music sure sounds nice. Add professional-quality polish to your streams, YouTube videos, podcasts, and more with a gigantic bundle of licensed tracks and worldwide rights. One download gives you royalty-free music ranging from Arcade Anthems to Blockbuster Beasts. In this Humble exclusive, you’ll also unlock the Action Hero, Prodigy, and Starter Plans! Get a massive library of over 300,000 royalty-free songs and sounds from AudioHero Inc.—complete with licenses included—all for a price you choose! Plus, a portion of your purchase helps support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals.

Perpetual Licensing Included

Pay $2 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $2,832. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $2 purchase. Pay $2 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. All keys can be redeemed on AudioHero's website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

enchantedlands.description_text: This collection of 12 ethereal tracks is your sonic key to mystical realms, blending delicate fantasy tones, serene spiritual hymns, and playful childhood wonder to score everything from enchanted trailers and magical gameplay to heartwarming animated stories. Unlock the door to your next creative adventure.

dangerzone_audiohero.description_text: Unleash nature's fury and industrial chaos with this intense collection of disaster and emergency sounds. Features roaring avalanches, rumbling earthquakes, nuclear alarms, and violent storms for maximum tension. Perfect for survival scenes, disaster films, and high-stakes trailers. Embrace the chaos.

medievalshonor.description_text: Transport your projects to a time of epic battles and ancient villages with the Medieval's Honor sound pack. Features clashing swords, thunderous cavalry, castle ambience, and crowd-filled markets for total immersion. Perfect for historical epics, fantasy games, and dramatic storytelling. Craft your legend.

actionheroplan_audiohero.description_text: Get access to over 300,000 tracks of royalty-free music and sound effects with your Action Hero plan, which gives you one hundred (100) downloads of your choice! + BONUS: CINEMATIC IMMERSION MEGA PACK | 450 EPIC SFX & MUSIC FOR FILMS & GAMES

dramascenes.description_text: Profound intimacy and minimalist tension, designed for the heart of the story. From haunting, suspended atmospheres and melancholic indie strolls to tender, tear-jerking piano motifs, this collection scores the unspoken—the quiet confessions, the lonely struggles, and the raw, human reveals.

starterplan_audiohero.description_text: Get access to over 300,000 tracks of royalty-free music and sound effects with your starter plan, which gives you one track of your choice for your next project.

actionpacked.description_text: An arsenal of high-voltage anthems built for velocity and victory. From driving electro-rock and grinding industrial tech to defiant sports swagger, this collection is engineered to power your most intense sequences—think championship highlights, cyberpunk pursuits, and trailer moments that hit like a fist. Dominate the frame.

ontheroad.description_text: Soundtrack the journey. From driving techno-pop and exotic world rhythms to heroic sports anthems and expansive corporate energy, this collection powers cross-continental edits, documentary montages, and content built for movement and momentum. Chase the horizon.

blockbusterbeasts.description_text: Unleash raw, cinematic power. This pack of explosive tracks is your ultimate weapon for high-octane storytelling, blending skull-crushing metal, driving orchestral action, and gritty rock anthems to fuel everything from epic sports highlights and brutal trailers to intense gameplay and investigative thrillers. Command the energy. Dominate the scene.

tensionbuilders.description_text:
Master the art of suspense with this meticulously crafted arsenal of cinematic pressure. Deploy metallic alarms, incoming shell screams, and symphonic stings to orchestrate unbearable anticipation. For scenes where every second counts and the air is electric with dread.

Preview: https://download.audiohero.com/playlist/1811659

metaversedreamscape.description_text: Enter the simulation. This collection merges cosmic drones with fractured reality—where radar sweeps warp into static and city ambience dissolves into data rain. Craft virtual worlds with ethereal textures, glitched transitions, and deep matrix rumbles.

legendarythemes.description_text: The definitive source for heroic storytelling, blending triumphant orchestral fanfares, poignant emotional themes, and determined ceremonial marches to score everything from legendary game trailers and blockbuster film moments to heartfelt documentaries and inspiring brand campaigns. Elevate your narrative. Become legendary.

spaceodyssey.description_text: Drift through the silent majesty of the cosmos with this ethereal collection. From the gentle hum of a drifting satellite to the awe-inspiring warp of a starship, each sound paints a portrait of the infinite.

gameon.description_text: Power up your projects with this essential toolkit of sci-fi and video game sounds. Features laser zaps, digital drones, explosive hits, and retro 8-bit transitions. Perfect for game design, tech trailers, and futuristic scenes. Press start.

snipersnest.description_text: This is precision, pure and lethal. Bone-rattling rifle cracks, shell casings hitting concrete, and the tense click of a scope cap. Distant ricochets and suppressed shots for maximum tension. For projects that demand unforgiving accuracy. Take the shot.

ominousovertures.description_text: From frightening horror underscores and bass-driven confusion to pulsating apocalyptic force and determined battle cries, this collection is engineered for trailers where tension boils over and games where every decision is critical.

tensionbuidlers.description_text:
Master the art of suspense with this meticulously crafted arsenal of cinematic pressure. Deploy metallic alarms, incoming shell screams, and symphonic stings to orchestrate unbearable anticipation. For scenes where every second counts and the air is electric with dread.

Preview: https://download.audiohero.com/playlist/1811659

horrorhaunts.description_text: Summon pure terror with this chilling collection of supernatural sounds and eerie atmospheres. Features ghostly whispers, demonic growls, creaking dread, and unsettling stings for maximum fear factor. Perfect for haunted scenes, psychological thrillers, and jump-scare moments. Embrace the darkness.

dynamicswishes.description_text: From thunderous burners and ghostly passes to sleek sword swishes and electric sweeps—this pack delivers the perfect whoosh for every moment. Shape transitions, emphasize action, and add invisible impact.

prodigyplan_audiohero.description_text: Get access to over 300,000 tracks of royalty-free music and sound effects with your Prodigy plan, which gives you fifty (50) downloads of your choice!

gagreel.description_text: Packed with classic cartoon chaos, from slipping slides and wobbly horns to perfectly timed boinks and silly splats. Your essential toolkit for comedic edits, animated antics, and lighthearted punchlines.

classicconsole.description_text: This is a curated list of 25 sound effects specifically designed to evoke the sounds of video games, arcades, and futuristic control consoles. The sounds are nostalgic, focusing on the 8-bit and 16-bit eras of gaming, as well as sci-fi interfaces. They are perfect for game development, retro-themed projects, or adding a playful, technological feel to media.

symphonicmajestic.description_text: Symphonic Majestic is a collection of history's most powerful compositions, from Mozart's soaring arias and Vivaldi's exultant concertos to Tchaikovsky's sweeping romanticism. This is the definitive source for unparalleled elegance, heroic fanfares, and profound emotional depth. Convey greatness.

uishaping.description_text: Click. Confirm. Play. Direct player engagement with responsive digital feedback. Crisp interface beeps, tactile button clicks, immersive arcade ambience, and slick screen transitions. Perfect for menus, notifications, and HUD interactions. Design an experience players feel.

quantumleap.description_text: From glitching cyber-suspense and eerie sci-fi soundscapes to pulsing corporate intrigue and Eastern-tinged noir, this collection is engineered for hacking sequences, neural interfaces, and scenes where reality glitches. Bend perception. Code the future.

detectivesdossier.description_text: From driving cyber-noir rhythms and psychedelic alternative rock to tense, minimalist suspense, this is the essential score for true crime podcasts, mystery docs, and underworld thrillers with a contemporary edge. Follow the clues.

wackyworld.description_text: Embrace the silly. From zany chases and clumsy capers to sweet, childlike wonder, this collection is your go-to for animated explainers, quirky branding, and any project that demands a dose of pure, unadulterated fun.

actionpackedsfx.description_text: Supercharge your scenes with this explosive toolkit of high-energy sounds. Features roaring car chases, combat punches, collapsing structures, and fiery impacts for maximum intensity. Perfect for trailers, fight sequences, and epic showdowns.

cinematicscores.description_text: Fuel your narratives with high-stakes emotion. This collection delivers driving action themes, haunting moments of regret, desperate chases, and the powerful relief of victory. Perfect for trailers, scenes of conflict, and epic storytelling.

explosionzone.description_text:
Detonate your scenes with everything from massive meteor impacts to sci-fi pipe bursts. Fuel the chaos with real-world recordings like gas can bombs and primacord blasts. Crush the mix with heavy debris, shattering glass, and deep, concussive hits.

Preview: https://download.audiohero.com/playlist/1810264

fantasyfrenzy.description_text: This collection is bursting with sparkling twinkles, shimmering atmospheres, and mystical spell impacts perfect for building enchanted worlds, from happy fairy glens to spooky haunted forests. Whether you need a cute cartoon zip, an epic meteor swoop, or an ethereal magical tone, we’ve got the secret ingredient to add a serious dose of enchantment.

orchestraldreams.description_text: This collection embodies the highest standards of musical excellence, featuring elegant minuets, dramatic symphonic movements, and profound operatic interludes. It is the definitive resource for projects requiring an air of cultivated sophistication, profound emotional depth, and unwavering prestige.

dronefleet.description_text: Think low-end rumbles, eerie textures, and magnetic energy that pulls your audience right in. Perfect for building suspense, crafting sci-fi worlds, or adding depth to your storytelling.

shadowsfall.description_text:
From creeping atmospherics and unsettling world rhythms to jumbled, anxious soundscapes and sinister urban pulses, this collection is meticulously designed for horror intros, investigative thrillers, and scenes where every shadow holds a secret. Build the tension. Let the fear breathe.

Preview: https://download.audiohero.com/playlist/1807844

extralife.human_name: Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals
extralife.description_text:
Donations to support Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Extra Life is a Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals fundraising program that empowers the gaming community to make a difference in the lives of local sick and injured kids. Participants fundraise year-round and during a 24-hour gaming marathon each fall.

Getting involved is as easy as signing up online at extra-life.org, asking your friends and family to donate, and pledging to play games in support of the Children’s Miracle Network Hospital of your choice. You can play from the comfort of your own home, playing any game you want.

Since 2008, Extra Life has raised more than $75 million for member hospitals. Play games, heal kids and join the community today at www.extra-life.org.

weddingwonders.description_text: Featuring stately processional anthems, reverent classical canons, and soaring orchestral fanfares, this is the definitive score for the solemn exchange of vows, the majestic bridal entrance, and the joyful recessional.

glitchdominion_audiohero.description_text: This pack is your secret weapon, loaded with 25 electronic errors, glitches, and digital hits. Instantly inject raw energy into your tracks with sharp error beeps, buzzing malfunctions, and powerful electro hits. Perfect for crafting killer breakdowns, adding gritty texture, or designing the most impactful transitions for your next project.

warzone.description_text: This is combat, uncut. Raw gunfire, artillery blasts, and shell casings hitting concrete. Haunting submarine creaks and close-range grenade detonations. For creators who refuse to sugarcoat war. Bring the brutality.

creaturefeaturefx.description_text: Listen… if you dare. Summon nightmares with bone-chilling growls, monstrous breaths, and grotesque feeding sounds. From prehistoric screeches and cave monster cries to alien hisses and beastly attacks—unleash pure terror. Perfect for horror games, creature reveals, and scenes that demand dread.

racingrush.description_text: Inject high-octane energy into your projects with this explosive collection of race sounds. Features roaring engines, screeching tires, intense crashes, and roaring crowd ambience for full-speed immersion. Perfect for car chases, sports highlights, and adrenaline-fueled sequences.

arcadeanthems.description_text: Blending punchy chiptune beats, cheerful retro rock, and triumphant victory themes. From frantic level clears and busy digital afternoons to celebratory win screens, this collection is your high-score soundtrack for gaming content, tech reviews, and vibrant, upbeat projects. Power up.

cataclysm.description_text: Drive impact with visceral car crashes, metallic hits, and deep, hollow thuds. Elevate tension using reversed reverbs, pulpy impacts, and eerie distant blows. Perfect for chase scenes, combat moments, and dramatic reveals. Make every hit felt—your audience won’t just hear it, they’ll sense it.

cinematicimmersion_450epicsfxandmusicfor.human_name: CINEMATIC IMMERSION: 450 EPIC SFX & MUSIC FOR FILMS & GAMES
cinematicimmersion_450epicsfxandmusicfor.description_text: Welcome to Cinematic Immersion, a colossal library of 450 professionally crafted sound effects and music tracks designed for creators who refuse to settle. This isn't just a sound pack; it's your all-access pass to the visceral, emotional, and awe-inspiring audio that transforms moving images into unforgettable experiences.

spacehord.description_text: Fuel your sci-fi epics and ambient journeys. This collection of 12 atmospheric tracks is your command center for the cosmos, blending deep-space tension, eerie ambience, and driving electronic pulses to score everything from interstellar horror and cyberpunk tension to serene orbital vistas and introspective dreams. Launch your next visionary project.

atmosphericaudio.description_text: Craft immersive worlds with our curated Atmospheric Audio toolkit. Explore a spectrum of textured drones, from crystalline tones to industrial hums. Perfect for building tension in sci-fi, fantasy, or dramatic narratives. Elevate your soundscape with professional, mood-defining ambiences.

buttonmasters.description_text: Design the perfect interface with this essential collection of UI and button sounds. Features futuristic clicks, satisfying beeps, sci-fi switches, and digital telemetry tones. Perfect for game menus, app interactions, and tech prototypes. Click. Accept. Engage.

adrenalinerush.description_text: Adrenaline Rush delivers tracks of raw, unfiltered sonic aggression, blending pummeling rock, savage electronic pulses, and brutal sports anthems engineered for maximum impact. Soundtrack the final push, the game-winning play, and the high-octane chase. Drop the beat. Start the riot.

hauntedharmonies.description_text: Haunted Harmonies is a symphony of shadow and spectacle, merging brutal orchestral force with eerie, supernatural atmosphere. From apocalyptic battles and cursed revelations to sinister magic shows and heroic struggles against the void, this collection is forged for epic horror, dark fantasy, and trailers where light fights to survive the fall.

epicquesttrailer.description_text:
This collection is your all-in-one toolkit for cinematic storytelling. Craft moments of hushed tension with haunting drones, build momentum for the coming conflict, and unleash unforgettable themes of heroism and triumph. Perfect for trailers, reveals, and any project demanding a powerful emotional arc.

Preview: https://download.audiohero.com/playlist/1807163

soniccrafting.description_text: A sound designer's essential arsenal of precision and texture. This delivers raw, modular components—harsh zaps, turbulent whooshes, and gritty risers. Sculpt unique moments with LFE-driven feedback, glitched accents, and metallic stings. Build everything from sci-fi interfaces to visceral impacts. For the architects of sound.

heroscall.description_text: This pack is your secret weapon for cinematic build-ups, dramatic reverses, and powerful impact hits that will make your audience hold their breath. Craft the perfect tension with angelic risers, mysterious textures, and sci-fi vibes.

quantumleapsfx.description_text: This pack is loaded with 25 futuristic and atmospheric sound effects. It features deep sci-fi drones, glitchy electronic tones, and powerful laser zaps. You'll find cool industrial textures like reversed metal hits and robotic servo sounds. Perfect for giving any project a modern, cutting-edge vibe.

adventureawaits_audiohero.description_text: Embark on your next cinematic journey with the "Adventure Awaits" sound pack.

epicquest.description_text: From earth-shattering explosions and powerful tank cannons to haunting cathedral bells and mysterious drones, we've packed this collection with everything you need to build tension, create drama, and craft that unforgettable finale.

wackyworldsounds.description_text: Inject Fun. Bring your projects to life with a burst of playful energy and animated charm. Packed with classic cartoon zaps, whimsical whistles, rubbery stretches, and hilarious vocal effects. Perfect for adding character to animations, scoring comedic moments, or creating a lighthearted vibe.

featurefilmfestival.description_text: From bittersweet solo piano and brooding western regret to spacey, contemplative drones and subtle romantic undertones, it’s the essential score for character-driven dramas, festival shorts, and narratives that thrive on raw, emotional authenticity. Tell the quiet stories.

legendsoftheroundtable.description_text: An earth-stained Celtic anthems and haunting medieval elegies. From raw, percussive pagan rhythms and mournful pipe melodies to noble, battle-worn resolve, this is the score for a darker epic—think brutal strategy games, gritty historical dramas, and fantasy with blood on its sword.

retrorevival.description_text: A time capsule of classic cool, blending swaggering '80s rock, pulsing synthwave, and iconic TV themes. From confident intros and tense detective cues to smooth tropical escapes, this collection is your secret weapon for throwback commercials, retro gaming, and content that demands authentic vintage flair. Rewind the clock. Make it classic.

rockrage.description_text: Built for high-octane sports highlights, intense gameplay montages, and any scene that demands raw, unfiltered power. This is the sound of rebellion, competition, and pure adrenaline. Smash the ceiling.

herosjourney.description_text: This powerhouse collection of 12 tracks is your all-access pass to cinematic greatness, blending pulsing electronic tension, timeless orchestral grandeur, and global rhythms to fuel everything from blockbuster trailers and intense gameplay to viral content. Stop searching and start creating—your saga starts here.

hitstoolbox.description_text: An essential collection of precision impact design. Features everything from sharp synthetic drum hits and electroshock zaps to low-frequency rumbles and vaporizing whip cracks. Includes reverse impacts, orchestral stings, and textured accents like squeaky metal and synthetic crunches. Perfect for trailers, game UI, and adding punch to any production.

extralife.description_text:
Donations to support Extra Life / Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Extra Life is a Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals fundraising program that empowers the gaming community to make a difference in the lives of local sick and injured kids. Participants fundraise year-round and during a 24-hour gaming marathon each fall.

Getting involved is as easy as signing up online at extra-life.org, asking your friends and family to donate, and pledging to play games in support of the Children’s Miracle Network Hospital of your choice. You can play from the comfort of your own home, playing any game you want.

Since 2008, Extra Life has raised more than $75 million for member hospitals. Play games, heal kids and join the community today at www.extra-life.org.

Everything you need to dip your toes into programming languages is here in one bundle—pay what you want and help support the charity of your choice with your purchase!

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

The video courses in this bundle are available through: InformIT

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Choose Your Own Charity. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

learnmorepython3thehardway.human_name: Learn More Python 3 the Hard Way
learnmorepython3thehardway.description_text:
In Learn Python 3 the Hard Way, Zed Shaw taught you the basics of Programming with Python 3. Now, in Learn More Python 3 the Hard Way, you’ll go far beyond the basics by working through 52 brilliantly crafted projects. Each one helps you build a key practical skill, combining demos to get you started and challenges to deepen your understanding.

This course will reward you for every minute you put into it. Soon, you’ll go beyond merely writing code that runs: you’ll craft high-quality Python code that solves problems. You’ll be a serious Python programmer.

This Book Is Perfect For

- Junior Developers and Seasoned Programmers working with Python

learnpythonthehardway5thedition.human_name: Learn Python the Hard Way, 5th Edition
learnpythonthehardway5thedition.description_text: Master Python from the ground up with this proven guide for beginners. Start fast with Jupyter and Anaconda, then transition to professional tools. Reinforce learning through hands-on exercises, explore Python’s inner workings, and tackle real-world data science. With revamped OOP, cleaner code, and a dash of humor, this book makes serious learning surprisingly fun.

pythonforprogrammers.description_text: Accelerate your Python mastery with 500+ hands-on examples and real-world case studies. Designed for experienced developers, this guide dives into Python’s core and advanced features—data science, AI, machine learning, NLP, computer vision, and more. Work with Jupyter, IPython, and cloud APIs like IBM Watson and Azure. Learn by coding and build powerful, scalable solutions with modern Python tools.

superchargedpython.description_text:
Supercharged Python is the ideal resource for those seeking to improve their Python skills and explore advanced features. Authors Brian Overland and John Bennett present complex topics concisely, using simple examples and practical exercises. Starting with easy entry points, they guide readers towards creating utilities, games, and solving puzzles. With clear explanations and illustrations, this guide equips readers with the knowledge and understanding to effectively apply these Python features and techniques:

-Coding for runtime efficiency

-Lambda functions and their appropriate usage.

-Learn about version management, localization, regular expressions, binary operators, radix conversions, data formatting, Django web development, graphics programming, magic methods, and more.

begintocodewithpython.description_text:
Become a Python programmer–and have fun doing it!

Start writing software that solves real problems, even if you have absolutely no programming experience! This friendly, easy, full-color book puts you in total control of your own learning, empowering you to build unique and useful programs. Microsoft has completely reinvented the beginning programmer’s tutorial, reflecting deep research into how today’s beginners learn, and why other books fall short. Begin to Code with Python is packed with innovations, from its “Snaps” prebuilt operations to its “Make Something Happen” projects. Whether you’re a total beginner or you’ve tried before, this guide will put the power, excitement, and fun of programming where it belongs: in your hands!

learnenoughpythontobedangerous.human_name: Learn Enough Python to Be Dangerous
learnenoughpythontobedangerous.description_text:
All You Need to Know, and Nothing You Don't, to Solve Real Problems with Python

Python is a great first language to learn, but you don't need to learn 'everything' to get started, just how to use it efficiently to solve real problems. In Learn Enough Python to Be Dangerous, you will learn the specific concepts, skills, and approaches you need to be professionally productive.

The book introduces Python both as a general-purpose language and as a specialist tool for web development and data science, presenting focused examples and exercises that help you internalize what matters, without wasting time on unnecessary details. Soon, it'll be like you were born knowing this stuff--and you'll be suddenly, seriously dangerous.

foundationalpythonfordatascience.description_text:
Data science instructor and practitioner Kennedy Behrman first walks through the process of learning to code for the first time with Python and Jupyter notebooks, then introduces key libraries every Python data science programmer needs to master. Once you've learned these foundations, Behrman introduces intermediate and applied Python techniques for real-world problem-solving.

Throughout, Foundational Python for Data Science presents hands-on exercises, learning assessments, case studies, and more—all created with Colab (Jupyter compatible) notebooks, so you can execute all coding examples interactively without installing or configuring any software.

pythonprogrammingwithdesignpatterns.description_text:
Developers seek design patterns for writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code. In this Python-specific guide, James W. Cooper presents 23 proven patterns in a friendly and practical manner, suitable for all Python developers. With visual and example-driven explanations, he demonstrates techniques for creating effective object-oriented code in Python. The book includes a succinct introduction to quickly familiarize newcomers and those transitioning from other languages.

-Review Python objects and visual programming essentials.

-Understand the purpose and benefits of design patterns for improving code quality.

-Utilize creational, structural, and behavioral patterns to enhance flexibility, simplify complexity, and optimize object communication.

roomtoread.description_text:
Donations to support Room to Read are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

We envision a world in which all children can pursue a quality education that enables them to reach their full potential and contribute to their communities and the world.

Room to Read seeks to transform the lives of millions of children in low-income communities by focusing on literacy and gender equality in education. Working in collaboration with local communities, partner organizations and governments, we develop literacy skills and a habit of reading among primary school children, and support girls to complete secondary school with the relevant life skills to succeed in school and beyond.

pandasforeveryone.description_text: Master data analysis with Pandas—no experience required. This hands-on guide walks you through real-world tasks like cleaning, reshaping, and visualizing data using Python’s powerful Pandas library. Learn to handle missing data, merge datasets, and build predictive models with scikit-learn. Updated for Python 3.9, it’s perfect for analysts, students, and developers ready to turn data into insight.

introductiontopython2ndedition_learnhowt.human_name: Introduction to Python, 2nd Edition: Learn How to Program Today with Python
introductiontopython2ndedition_learnhowt.description_text: Start coding today—even if you’ve never seen a line of code. This hands-on video course teaches Python through games, real-world projects, and generative AI tools to boost your learning. Explore functions, loops, data structures, web apps, and data analysis with Pandas and Seaborn. With PyCharm and Jupyter notebooks, you’ll build skills fast and have fun doing it. No experience required.

pandasdatacleaningandmodelingwithpythonl.human_name: Pandas Data Cleaning and Modeling with Python
pandasdatacleaningandmodelingwithpythonl.description_text: Transform messy data into actionable insights with Pandas. In this hands-on video course, Daniel Y. Chen teaches you how to clean, reshape, and model data using Python’s powerful libraries. Learn to apply functions, handle dates, use regex, and fit models—all with real-world examples. Perfect for aspiring data scientists with basic Python skills looking to level up.

pythondistilled.description_text:
Python educator Dave Beazley’s concise handbook focuses on the core of the Python programming language, with code examples to illuminate how Python works and how to structure programs that can be more easily explained, tested, and debugged. Rather than covering every possible feature and quirk of a 30-year-old language, this pragmatic guide provides a concise narrative related to fundamental programming topics that form the foundation for Python projects of any size including:

-Data abstraction, control flow, program structure, functions, objects, modules, generators, classes, I/O handling, and dicts.

-Gaining proficiency in functional programming idioms, controlling objects, and understanding class behavior.

-Planning for project growth by comprehending modules and packages/

machinelearningwithpythonforeveryone.human_name: Machine Learning with Python for Everyone
machinelearningwithpythonforeveryone.description_text:
Master machine learning with Python, regardless of your skill level. Mark E. Fenner has designed this for people new to Machine Learning who can write Python code. Through plain-English explanations, visual aids, and practical examples, you'll learn the processes, patterns, and strategies for building effective learning systems. Explore key mathematical and computational topics in an accessible way and follow step-by-step instructions to build, train, and evaluate learning systems. This guides insights will be applicable to every learning system you ever build or use.

-Understand machine learning algorithms, models, and core concepts.

-Develop proficiency in classification, regression, feature engineering, and system optimization.

-Apply machine learning techniques to analyze images and text.

effectivepython.description_text: Unlock Python’s full potential with 125 expert tips from Google veteran Brett Slatkin. This updated edition helps you write cleaner, faster, and more maintainable code using Pythonic best practices. From core syntax to advanced topics like C-extensions and performance tuning, each item delivers actionable insights and real-world examples. Ideal for developers ready to elevate their Python mastery.

learnenoughdevelopertoolstobedangerous_c.human_name: Learn Enough Developer Tools to Be Dangerous: Command Line, Text Editor, and Git Version Control Essentials
learnenoughdevelopertoolstobedangerous_c.description_text: Master the essential tools every developer uses—fast. This hands-on video course teaches the Unix command line, text editing (including Vim), and Git version control from scratch. Whether you're collaborating with developers or becoming one, you'll gain real-world skills to navigate files, write scripts, and manage code with confidence. No experience needed—just learn enough to be dangerous.

algorithmsanddatastructuresinpython.human_name: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python
algorithmsanddatastructuresinpython.description_text: Unlock the power of Python with this essential guide to data structures and algorithms. From arrays and stacks to graphs and hash tables, this book builds core CS skills that elevate your coding efficiency. Learn how to choose the right structure for any problem, optimize performance, and master techniques that scale with today’s computing demands. Ideal for developers ready to go beyond basic Python.
